name: Bibi Blocksberg: Das Große Hexenbesen-Rennen 2
overview: The new witch broom race is characterized by a completely revised and significantly improved graphics, which clearly surpasses its predecessor and thus ensures even more identification with Bibi's adventures. This time, the players will find themselves in three worlds that fans of the little witch have already learned to love in the cartoon series: to Transylvania, the Orient and the dinosaurs. There is something for every taste here. Screenshot: Bibi Blocksberg - The big witch broom race 2 The big witch broom race is entering a new round! Each of the 12 racetracks is characterized by special features that influence the game. From simple shortcuts, jumps and obstacles to spontaneous route changes during the race, everything is included. The airfield has increased to eight characters and also has eight witch brooms that can be freely combined with one another. In addition, there are eight completely redesigned hex potions that provide excitement and invite you to play tactical games.
